m_szDocTitle: Honda Clarity Fuel Cell Sedan Makes North American Debut at 2015 Los Angeles Auto Show
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Honda Clarity Fuel Cell Sedan Makes North American Debut at 2015 Los Angeles Auto Show - Five-passenger Clarity Fuel Cell available late 2016 initially to customers in California with competitive pricing - Next-generation Honda FCV provides significant gains in packaging, interior space and real-world performance, including an anticipated driving range in excess of 300 miles - Additionally, the platform underpinning the Clarity Fuel Cell will also serve as the foundation for a next-generation plug-in hybrid electric vehicle Honda will launch nationwide by 2018
